alert.note: Alert for Adams; Clay; Fillmore; Nuckolls; Thayer; Webster; York (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 12 at 8:26PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Jewell, Clay, Nuckolls, eastern Webster, southeastern Adams, southwestern York, western Fillmore and western Thayer Counties through 900 PM CDT... At 825 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Inland to 6 miles south of Lawrence to Burr Oak. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Inland around 830 PM CDT. Harvard around 835 PM CDT. Clay Center, Nelson and Montrose around 840 PM CDT. Nora around 845 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Formoso, Saronville, Webber, Lovewell State Park, Sutton, Ruskin, Oak, Davenport, Hardy and Grafton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for north central Kansas...and south central and east central Nebraska.

area.areaDesc: Adams; Clay; Fillmore; Nuckolls; Thayer; Webster; York
